ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie’s been on a rough ride of late - fighting Detroit’s toughest infected, battling Space Knights, spelunking in sewage - but things are about to get much worse for our bladed bad ass, because now her weapons are turning on herself!! It’s Vampblade versus... the Vampblades!?!
Features a risqué variant, plus “90s Monster” (Andrew Mangum) and artist (Hyde Chang) variants and risqué variants.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 4 | C | 90s Monster Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum | 5 | D | 90s Monster Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum | 6 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Hyde Chang | 7 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Hyde Chang | 8 | G | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Jason Martin | 2 | H | New York Comic Con Exclusive Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Jason Martin | 3 |
